attr.title: Mage Recall
attr.desc: A short (1 - 2 Hour) experimental Gameboy-styled adventure inspired by the likes of Golden Sun. Vrin is a mage down on her luck as she finds herself in a small town on the brink of rebellion.
attr.inst: Thank you to Nion for allowing PortMaster to make this game Ready to Run.
attr.inst_md: Thank you to Nion for allowing PortMaster to make this game Ready to Run.
